message.content:
As of my knowledge cutoff in 2021, the richest movie actor in the world is Shah Rukh Khan, with a net worth of approximately $600 million. He resides in Mumbai, India.

The richest movie actress in the world is currently Jami Gertz, with a net worth of approximately $3 billion. She resides in Los Angeles, California, United States.

The richest movie director in the world is George Lucas, with a net worth of approximately $10 billion. He resides in Marin County, California, United States.
